title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not change immediately.
Steps to reproduce:1. Create a label in the UI.
2. Set the font size of the label to a different value.
3.
OB: Label height is not changed right after setting the font size in the UI.
EB: The label height should adjust accordingly when the font size is modified.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the UI where labels can be modified.
3. Create a new label.
4. Set the font size of the label to a different value.
5. Observe that the label height does not change immediately.
